pickupRequestCompletedByOwner.description: Pickup completed for your listing at {{locationAddress}}

pickupRequestCreated.title: Pickup Request Sent
pickupRequestCreated.description: You sent a pickup request for {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}}

pickupRequestAccepted.title: Pickup Request Accepted!
pickupRequestAccepted.description: Your pickup request for {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}} was accepted!

pickupRequestRejected.description: Your pickup request for {{locationAddress}} was not accepted

pickupRequestCompleted.title: Pickup Completed
